column4: anyone know how to set up what gnome-volume-manager starts for "importing photos"
I don't want gthumb, I want a script of my own.
use ImageMagick's 'display' with python or similar.
why would I want "imagemagicks display with python or similar" to run?  I have a script of my own that does exactly what I wanted.
if you have something that works then good.
yes, I do.  that's why I mentioned that in my initial query.  Hence my curiosity as to what on earth you were suggesting.  Perhaps reading entire sentences?
